https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nhCcMBnKHkGHBd85PYcVkrGhP0X.jpg The film revolves around an atheist named Mallikarjuna who falls in love with an ardent devotee of Lord Shiva; when an evil power threatens the world and his beloved, he decides to stand up against it and fight to save the world. Damarukam
